flex布局

By pengyouyi

发表于 2016-10-11

flex布局

demo

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <title>flex布局example</title>
</head>
<style>
*{
    margin:0;
    padding: 0;
}
#wrap{
    display: flex;
    //justify-content: space-between;
    //justify-content: flex-end;
    //align-items:center;
    flex-direction: column;
    margin:0 auto;
    width:1000px;
    height: 300px;
    border:1px solid red;
}
header,footer{
    height:40px;
    background: #f60;
}
.main{
    display: flex;
    height:160px;
    margin:20px 0;
}
.list{
    margin-right:20px;
    background: yellow;
}
.li1{
    width:100px;
}
.li2{
    flex:1;
}
.main #l3{
    width:40px;
    margin-right:0;
}
</style>
<body>
<div id="wrap">
    <header>头部</header>
    <div class="main">
        <div class="list li1">1</div>
        <div class="list li2">2</div>
        <div class="list" id="l3">3</div>
    </div>
    <footer>脚部</footer>
</div>


    </script>
</body>
</html>
